table.name: civicrm_webtracking
table.comment: This table will hold web tracking parameters for various pages.

field.name: enable_tracking
field.title: Enable Tracking
field.comment: User chooses to enable web tracking or not?

field.name: tracking_id
field.title: UA ID
field.comment: Unique UAID provided by google analytics.

field.name: page_id
field.title: Page ID
field.comment: Holds the id to the CiviEvent/CiviContribution/CiviDonation.

field.name: page_category
field.title: Page Category
field.comment: Whether the Page this row refers to is a CiviEvent/CiviContribution/CiviDonation Page.
